about_the_game:
* Extremely strategic dungeon-style exploration
* Warm and healing gothic style painting
* Each chapter has a unique core gameplay mechanic.
* Unknown events will be triggered randomly during the exploration process.
* Dream wheel to play with treasure chests to get rich rewards.
* Challenge mode that combines strategy and speed, with a lot of spicy flavors
* Normal, Hard, and Abyss difficulty levels are stacked with different settings.

Card Puzzle is a high strategy adventure game with a gothic style featuring cat images. Here you will experience exciting dungeon-style level exploration, strategic use of weapons & equipment & scrolls and artifacts, defeating mutated cats, saving Erin from a nightmare, and teaming up with cat warriors to turn a nightmare into a dream.




What is high strategy? Spicy level design with unique core gameplay in each chapter to keep the game fresh at all times. Normal and Hard modes not challenging? Abyss Mode lets you experience the striking sensation of fighting under the siege of cat monsters with just a click of the mouse. The subconsciously designed Challenge Mode is even more of a time reaper, and the night has already fallen after one game.



Under the nightmare-filled adventure, you will encounter mutated cat-cat monsters catalyzed by psychic fear, which possess bizarre looks and highly aggressive moves. Before attacking, please double check your equipment and supplies to see if you can defeat it (P.s don't forget to check its skills). The challenging Elite Meow is waiting to be challenged by you, and is the full in-game reward an “advantageous stacking” or a “temptation trap”?



Gothic painting style extreme display - nightmare vs. beautiful dream, even if you are trapped in nightmares, do not be timid to retreat, and cat warriors hand in hand with the defeat of the cat cat monster to save the world deeply trapped in it, collect the collection of fragments of the painting book, to restore the darkness shrouded dreams, so that the light to reappear.



In addition to fighting in the level, you will also encounter a variety of random events, unknown treasure chests, mysterious supplies, how to choose, how to choose will directly affect the later strategy, please choose carefully.



There are six lovely companions to choose from in the game: Dream Hunter Swordsman - Ace, Dream Invoking Warlock - Erin, Miracle Archer - Alle, Silver Knight - Knight Nate, Order Mage - Maria, and Vigil Giant - Pumbaa.
Each character has different talents and professions. Enhance initial attributes, strengthen and upgrade, and experience the fun brought by different characters!



Adventure Mode and Challenge Mode co-exist, for those who like character development and casual gameplay, Adventure Mode is the place to learn about the rules of the dream world, while those who want to break the rules and constantly challenge themselves can look for a more unique sense of strategy and racing in Challenge Mode

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: CARD QUEST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP,Vista,7,8/8.1,10
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory,capable of OpenGL 3.0+support（2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable）
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP,Vista,7,8/8.1,10
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory,capable of OpenGL 3.0+support（2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable）

reviews:
“Card Quest takes cats as the theme and combines innovative card gameplay. It emphasizes both cuteness and strategy. A must-play for tough guys!”
顶级玩家TOPGAMER

“Undoubtedly the art style is the most eye-catching part of Card Quest. What's even more impressive is that both the art and the fragmented storylines are continuously injecting fairytale-like brightness into the dark world, as if kindling a warm candlelight in the deep of the night.”
游戏艺术家GameArt
short_description: 《CARD QUEST》 is a game themed around the image of cats, featuring a rich combination of elemental schools, random equipment upgrades and breakthroughs, unique core gameplay for each chapter, and various random events.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, French, German
*languages with full audio support
